Seen that a lot of ppl are complaining about the .dll file is missing. Here is what you do: Copy the .dll fil that is missing to the same folder as the crack is in. 
Your game is most likely installed here: C:\Program Files\Ubisoft\Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Vegas
And so is your crack. Go into the folder "binaries" and COPY the missing .dll file into the folder: C:\Program Files\Ubisoft\Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Vegas
